Description:
IntroductionYour Role and ResponsibilitiesAs Delivery Practitioner, you are responsible for processing of Import/Export/Document checking trade finance transactions following the standardized process.Responsibilities:Initial scrutiny/verification of documents
Retrieval of transactions from FileNet, validation of transaction, input/ updating of data into iVision
Input data in FileNet and forward for validation
Creation of SWIFT messages
Creation of discrepancy notes
Scrutiny / verification of documents. Authorize transactions (Validation of data in iVision)
Ensure prompt error free/accurate transaction processing while meeting the prescribed turnaround times and service delivery standards
Identify transactions as “complex” wherever applicable
Build and send throwbacks Sending transactions back to the in putter for review wherever necessary
Ensure Cohesive to the internal guidelines and ICC guidelines
Ensure adherence to standard operating procedures (SOPs)
Highlight to DHS (Deputy Head of Section) any procedural modifications that may be required from time to time
Participate and give in Continuous Improvement initiatives inspired by Territory ManagerRequired Technical and Professional ExpertiseMinimum 1 year of work experience in Finance and accounting, basic accounting knowledge and understanding of various accounting principles
Willingness to perform duties in different shifts and adapt to constant changes
Ability to comprehend and process data, handle order fulfilment, collect and apply cash payments
Proficient to follow procedures, comfortable in adapting to transformation within business unitPreferred Technical and Professional ExpertiseProficient in Microsoft Office applications and familiar with Accounting terminologies
You love collaborative environments that use agile methodologies to encourage creative design thinking and find innovative ways to develop with cutting edge technologies
Ambitious individual who can work under their own direction towards agreed targets/goals and with creative approach to work
Intuitive individual with an ability to manage change and proven time management
Proven interpersonal skills while contributing to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed
Up-to-date technical knowledge by attending educational workshops, reviewing publicationsJob Details
